restaurant-automation.title: Restaurant Management System (RMS)
restaurant-automation.summary: Complete digital ecosystem for restaurants with omnichannel ordering (Table, Kiosk, Delivery), real-time KDS, and integrated financial management with M-Pesa/e-Mola.
restaurant-automation.problem: Inefficiency in order flow, communication errors between service and kitchen, and complexity in financial reconciliation of multiple payment methods (M-Pesa, e-Mola, Cash) in Mozambican restaurants.
restaurant-automation.solution: Developed a 'Mobile-First' Progressive Web App (PWA) that integrates the entire restaurant flow. Includes QR Code digital menu, self-service Kiosks, delivery management, and a real-time Kitchen Display System (KDS). The backend processes mobile payments automatically and generates detailed profitability reports.
restaurant-automation.challenges: Ensuring real-time synchronization (milliseconds) between table orders and the kitchen display (KDS) using Socket.io, and implementing a failsafe financial architecture with ACID transactions in PostgreSQL for payment reconciliation.
restaurant-automation.results: Drastic reduction in service time, elimination of order errors ('paper slips'), and total financial control with automatic cash reconciliation.
benefits: Instant orders from table to kitchen (no manual note-taking)
KDS (Kitchen Display System) replacing printers and organizing production
Financial management with automatic M-Pesa/e-Mola reconciliation
Real-time stock updates and product availability
restaurant-automation.targetAudience: Medium to large restaurants, fast-food chains, and high-volume take-away/delivery establishments requiring rigorous control.
features: Omnichannel Flow: Dine-in, Kiosk, Take-away, and Delivery in one place
KDS (Kitchen Display System): Real-time kitchen panel with sound alerts
Table Management: Occupancy status and orders per table
Digital Payments: Integration and reconciliation of mobile payments
Stock Control: Immediate availability management (86 items)
Printing Support: ESC/POS thermal printer ready architecture
RBAC Permissions: Admin, Manager, Waiter, Kitchen, Delivery
Advanced Reports: Sales by channel, top-selling dishes, financial performance
techStackDetails: Frontend: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Recharts
Backend: Node.js, Express.js (Raw SQL queries for performance)
Security: JWT Auth, Bcrypt, Zod Validation, Helmet
restaurant-automation.differentials: Designed specifically for the Mozambican market with native payment integrations. Premium UX that departs from the 'corporate software' standard, offering a fluid and modern experience for staff and customers.
restaurant-automation.projectStatus: Advanced Beta (Functional Demo). 50% of core features fully operational.
restaurant-automation.commercialGoal: Modernize the restaurant industry in Mozambique, reducing operational costs and fraud through total digitalization of order and payment flows.

siga.title: SIGA – Integrated Academic Management System
siga.summary: Complete platform for universities and schools, integrating academic and financial management, and portals for teachers and students.
siga.problem: SIGA resolves disorganization and inefficiency in traditional academic management, eliminating data decentralization, error-prone manual handling of grades and payments, lack of transparency, and slow document issuance.
siga.solution: Created a centralized platform with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). The system automates enrollments, payments with reconciliation, document issuance, and offers personalized dashboards. Features resilient operation (offline/online) and immediate visual feedback.
siga.challenges: Developing a complex system with multiple access permissions (RBAC) and ensuring the integrity of financial and academic data in a realistic simulated environment with MSW 2.0 and LocalStorage persistence.
siga.results: Robust system capable of managing the entire student lifecycle, from enrollment to graduation, with rigorous financial control.
benefits: Dedicated portals for Students and Teachers
Automation of enrollments and grade submission
siga.targetAudience: Universities, Higher Institutes, Technical Schools, and private educational institutions requiring integrated financial management.
features: Student Management (Full registration, documents, history)
Enrollment Management (Course registration, prerequisite validation)
Payment Management (Fees, fines, bank reconciliation)
Receipt/Slip Generation (Automatic issuance of proofs)
Course and Class Management (Teacher allocation, schedules, rooms)
Student Portal (Access to grades, analytical plan, financial, schedules)
Teacher Portal (Class management, grade submission, rosters)
Grade Submission (Secure system with weight and date validation)
Academic Record (Detailed analytical plan with GPA and credit calculation)
RBAC Permission System (Admin, Secretariat, Treasury, Coordination, Teacher, Student)
Financial Reports (Conciliation, debtors, revenue)
Dashboard with Statistics (Real-time KPIs per role)
techStackDetails: Styling: Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui, Lucide React
State: React Context API, SWR (Data Fetching)
siga.differentials: Premium UX/UI with clean and modern design. Role-oriented architecture where each user sees only what they need. Immediate visual feedback with Toasts and Skeletons. Detailed financial management integrated with service blocking. Offline/online resilience.
siga.projectStatus: In Development / Functional Prototype. Frontend complete with simulated flows via MSW.
siga.commercialGoal: Demonstrate the ability to architect complex systems with multiple business rules and serve as a basis for an educational SaaS.

gamenation.title: GameNation
gamenation.summary: Platform for selling Gift Cards and digital services in Mozambique with payments via M-Pesa.
gamenation.problem: Difficulty accessing global digital content (Steam, Netflix, Spotify) in Mozambique due to the lack of international credit cards and payment restrictions.
gamenation.solution: Developed a modern Web App (SPA) that allows the instant purchase of digital services using local payment methods (M-Pesa). The system delivers codes automatically via email and screen after payment confirmation.
gamenation.challenges: Implementing a 'Race-Condition-Free' code delivery system using ACID transactions in PostgreSQL to avoid duplicate sales and ensuring the security of digital code stock.
gamenation.results: Code Complete Platform (Advanced MVP) ready for production, with automated stock management and simplified purchase flow.
benefits: Instant digital purchases without a credit card
Local payments via M-Pesa (e-Mola placeholder integration)
Complete order history and code recovery
gamenation.targetAudience: Gamers, streaming consumers, and mobile users in Mozambique who need access to international services.
features: Multi-Category Catalog: Games, Streaming, Telecom, App Stores
Secure Checkout: Authentication via Supabase Auth and assisted payment flow
Automatic Delivery: Code release after payment confirmation
Admin Panel: Complete management of stock, sales, users, and finances
Security: Row Level Security (RLS) and payment validation
Gamer UI/UX: 'Dark Mode' design with fluid animations (Framer Motion)
Auditing: System logs for all critical operations
Notifications: Transactional emails via SendGrid and Telegram alerts
techStackDetails: Frontend: React 19, Vite, TailwindCSS, Radix UI
Server-side: Deno Edge Functions (Webhook handling, critical logic)
State Management: React Context + Custom Hooks
gamenation.differentials: Adapted to the Mozambican reality with international-level UX. Ensures the user never pays for an unavailable code thanks to rigorous transactional stock control.
gamenation.projectStatus: Code Complete (Advanced MVP). Ready to launch.
gamenation.commercialGoal: Democratize access to global digital products for the unbanked Mozambican public.
